name: Walk in the Night
description:
You are alone in the night. Weird creatures are everywhere. Only way to Survive is Kiling!

This game is Made for LOWREZJAM2021

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This was quite a challange to render the game at 64x64. Though it was painful but worthwhile. I couldn't polish and add music in the game because of some sudden urgency. I'll try to fix those when my Semester pressure will be a lil'bit less. I'm still pretty happy with the result considering it is my 2nd game and 1st time using unity. Anyways I wish you guys will have fun playing it. Again Thanks For Playing!!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Left/Right Arrows or A/D to Move

Spacebar to Jump

C to Attack

Esc to Pause

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This Game Was Developed by:

Art: iXALE

Code: iXALE

Sounds : Free sounds from MixKit (mixkit)
